verses.roman:
ratha-agre prabhu taiche karilā nartana
dekhi camatkāra haila sanātanera mana

synonyms: ratha-agre—in front of the car; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; taiche—similarly; karilā nartana—performed dancing; dekhi—seeing; camatkāra haila—was astonished; sanātanera mana—the mind of Sanātana.
translation: During the Ratha-yātrā festival, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu again danced before the cart of Jagannātha. When Sanātana Gosvāmī saw this, his mind was astonished.
